docs.snippet: The senator’s announcement was another blow to Mr. Trump as he tries to unite his party and win more support from women....
docs.lead_paragraph: The senator’s announcement was another blow to Mr. Trump as he tries to unite his party and win more support from women.
docs.abstract: Maine Sen Susan Collins says she will not vote for Donald J Trump, adding to list of prominent Republicans who are refusing to back their party's presidential nominee.

headline.main: Susan Collins of Maine Says She Will Not Vote for Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: A Senator From Maine Is the Latest to Object

docs.snippet: Governor Pence should either persuade his embattled running mate to exit the race or step aside himself....

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Matt Latimer, former speechwriter for Pres George W Bush, calls on vice-presidential nominee Indiana Gov Mike Pence to convince Donald Trump to save face and avoid humiliating defeat in presidential election by withdrawing from race.

headline.main: Mike Pence Should Get Donald Trump to Withdraw
headline.print_headline: How to Get Trump to Withdraw

docs.snippet: Most of Donald Trump’s proposals would hurt the economy and leave the country isolated from the world....
docs.lead_paragraph: Most of Donald Trump’s proposals would hurt the economy and leave the country isolated from the world.
docs.abstract: Editorial asserts Donald Trump's economic proposals would hurt economy, worsen negative effects of climate change and isolate United States from world; holds proposed tax cuts would vastly increase deficit and only benefit wealthiest Americans.

headline.main: Mr. Trump’s Losing Economic Game Plan

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump sought to move beyond a week of turmoil, turning his attention to the economy with a speech in which he cast himself as a president who could create new jobs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump sought to move beyond a week of turmoil, turning his attention to the economy with a speech in which he cast himself as a president who could create new jobs.
docs.abstract: Donald J Trump outlines his economic vision in speech at Detroit Economic Club, vowing to simplify tax system, rethink America’s energy policy and tear up trade agreements in effort to cast himself as creator of new jobs; address comes after week of turmoil over his remarks about Muslim family of fallen American soldier and several other miscues.

headline.main: Donald Trump Adopts G.O.P. Tax Cuts, but Balks at Trade Pacts
headline.print_headline: Trump Outlines Economic Agenda and Tax Changes

byline.original: By NEIL IRWIN and ALAN RAPPEPORT

docs.snippet: The group he has assembled, mostly businessmen, is atypical in their relative lack of economic credentials....
docs.lead_paragraph: The group he has assembled, mostly businessmen, is atypical in their relative lack of economic credentials.
docs.abstract: Andrew Ross Sorkin DealBook column contends Donald J Trump's list of economic advisers is surprisingly light on credentialed economists, but heavy on businessmen, moguls and would-be moguls; wonders if some establishment members will join his anti-establishment adviser entourage in future.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Economic Team Is Far From Typical
headline.print_headline: Trump’s Far From Usual Economic Brain Trust

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump suggested on Tuesday that gun rights activists could act to stop his Democratic rival Hillary Clinton from nominating liberal U.S. Supreme Court justices, igniting yet another firestorm of  criticism just as he sought to steer clear of controversy.

docs.snippet: Donald Trump ignited a fresh political firestorm Tuesday by declaring gun rights supporters might still find a way to stop Hillary Clinton, even if she should defeat him and then name anti-gun Supreme Court justices. Democrats pounced, accusing hi...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump ignited a fresh political firestorm Tuesday by declaring gun rights supporters might still find a way to stop Hillary Clinton, even if she should defeat him and then name anti-gun Supreme Court justices. Democrats pounced, accusing him of openly encouraging violence against his opponent.

headline.main: Trump Ignites New Firestorm: Gun Backers Might Stop Clinton
headline.print_headline: Trump Ignites New Firestorm: Gun Backers Might Stop Clinton

docs.snippet: When Hewlett Packard Enterprise CEO Meg Whitman announced last week that she wouldn't vote for her party's presidential nominee, Donald Trump, she pledged to raise money for the Democratic candidate, Hillary Clinton, and to urge like-minded Republ...
docs.lead_paragraph: When Hewlett Packard Enterprise CEO Meg Whitman announced last week that she wouldn't vote for her party's presidential nominee, Donald Trump, she pledged to raise money for the Democratic candidate, Hillary Clinton, and to urge like-minded Republicans to follow suit.

headline.main: Trump Flops With Silicon Valley Donors; Clinton Falls Short, Too
